column4: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Core_2_Duo_Support here it says that p5b series wont work with PATA/IDE stuff, well my DVD WRiter is IDE (Ye i should bought a ATA i know) Do i need to use a USB Memory Stick? or should i try to see if it works first?
Because if i need a USB Memory Stick i would need to buy that too now
thats your best bet, or removable hdd
you could do a netinst for reg debian, but you'll find that unless you find some drivers to use, it wont recognize your NIC either
